name: No Gravity
description: No Gravity is a free, 3D space shooter similar to Wing Commander with arcade-style gameplay. The action takes place in year 8002. The player is a pilot of space ship. He must complete various missions, like escorting, defending, reaching checkpoints and destroying enemies, but also large enemy base stations. The ship has various weapons, but the player must first find ammo. The game has 55 missions and ten training exercises.
